thread.title: PepsiCo 1Q Earnings: What to Watch

author: Cara Lombardo
title: PepsiCo 1Q Earnings: What to Watch
text:
PepsiCo Inc. is scheduled to report its first-quarter earnings before the market opens Thursday. Hereâ€™s what you need to know:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Adjusted earnings per share of 93 cents is the consensus of analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters, compared with 94 cents a year earlier.
REVENUE FORECAST: Analysts expect revenue of $12.4 billion,...
